html:
Splendour In The Grass Lineup Announced

Splendour in the Grass just announced their massive 2015 lineup and we've got the official playlist. Blur, Florence and the Machine, Mark Ronson, The Wombats, and Tame Impala, see you in July! Until then, follow the playlist for all the updates as they happen.
Listen to the lineup

Spotify Recommends

Check out the captivating 'Dark Child'- the first single off the debut album from New Zealand alt-country troubadour, Marlon Williams.
Listen Now

New Releases

Bitch Better Have My Money
Rihanna
Glitterbug
The Wombats
Magnolia Melancholia
Jamie T
CULTURE OF VOLUME
East India Youth
Cherry Bomb
Tyler, The Creator
Furious 7: Original Motion Picture Soundtrack
Various Artists

Spotify picks

Complete Mumford & Sons
Mumford & Sons
If you haven't heard their new singles "The Wolf" and "Believe," you're missing out. Listen here for these killer new tracks and all of their hits.
SPIRITS II
Passion Pit
Tomorrow we'll be exclusively streaming the new Passion Pit album! Prepare yourself with this playlist of their influences.
//shubiesnewbies\\
One to watch, Shura, has pulled together a playlist of the tracks she's currently listening to while in the studio.
Surfify
Surfaid
SurfAid and Spotify have teamed up to bring you a Spotify-exclusive album featuring the sounds of the surf. All revenue generated from royalties go to SurfAid, a non-profit humanitarian organisation improving the health, wellbeing and self-reliance of people living in isolated regions. Get listening (and donating)
Get Spotify for:   iPhoneiPadAndroidOther
This message was sent to fenwickreece08@gmail.com. If you don't want to receive these emails from Spotify in the future, you can edit your profile or unsubscribe.

Splendour In The Grass Lineup Announced
=======================================
 ( https://open.spotify.com/user/splendourinthegrassfestival/playlist/4bVQDSCqaTy5OErJP0UhKI )

 Splendour in the Grass just announced their massive 2015 lineup and we've got the official playlist. Blur, Florence and the Machine, Mark Ronson, The Wombats, and Tame Impala, see you in July! Until then, follow the playlist for all the updates as they happen. Listen to the lineup ( https://open.spotify.com/user/splendourinthegrassfestival/playlist/4bVQDSCqaTy5OErJP0UhKI )


Spotify Recommends
==================
 ( https://open.spotify.com/track/4LPuB6avoWYmKFjTDYj1kB )

 Check out the captivating 'Dark Child'- the first single off the debut album from New Zealand alt-country troubadour, Marlon Williams. Listen Now ( https://open.spotify.com/track/4LPuB6avoWYmKFjTDYj1kB )
